subject: Hockey, Ice
organizations: Carolina Hurricanes eliminated the Montreal Canadiens
lead_paragraph: Cory Stillman scored 1 minute 19 seconds into overtime and the Carolina Hurricanes eliminated the Montreal Canadiens with a 2-1 victory. The Hurricanes will face the Devils in the second round and will have home-ice advantage.
snippet: Cory Stillman scored 1 minute 19 seconds into overtime and the Carolina Hurricanes eliminated the Montreal Canadiens with a 2-1 victory. The Hurricanes will face the Devils in the second round and will have home-ice advantage.
